feed.title: Sparkour
feed.subtitle: An open-source collection of programming recipes for Apache Spark
feed.rights: © 2016 - 2019 by Brian Uri!. Released under Apache License 2.0.

entry.title: Python Update
entry.summary: <u>Tutorial #4: Writing and Submitting a Spark Application</u> has been updated with instructions for using Python 3. All recipes have been tested against Python 3.6.7.

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: Happy New Year! All recipes have been updated and tested against Spark 2.4.0. I have also incorporated some behind-the-scenes automation to streamline regression testing and make it easier for me to stay in sync with future Spark releases.

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: All recipes have been updated and tested for Spark 2.3.0 and Scala 2.11.12.
